knowledge_base.kyc: KYC stands for Know Your Customer. In 2026, most 'No-KYC' casinos still trigger a check if you withdraw more than $2,000 or 0.05 BTC.
knowledge_base.vpn: Most crypto casinos allow VPNs for privacy, but using them to bypass region locks (like playing from the US/UK) can lead to seized funds.
knowledge_base.wagerx: WagerX was founded in 2018 by Andreas Ericsson to provide forensic-level transparency in gambling.

audits.notes: Still the gold standard for 2026. No issues with large BTC withdrawals.
Triggered a soft-KYC on a 2 ETH withdrawal. Keep documents ready.
Excellent performance, but support chat is slow during peak hours.
